short_summary: Printing Services for Employment and Social Development Canada
description: The requirement is for Employment and Social Development Canada for printing services for standard size ESDC and Service Canada Envelopes. The print products resulting from this contract will ensure the delivery of services and benefits to the public.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### ENVELOPES PRINTING REQUEST

**Notice ID:** 100024134
**Publication Date:** September 1, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:**  September 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM

**Procurement Overview**
Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of standard size ESDC and Service Canada envelopes, along with shipping services to distribute the printed products to one of ESDC's Benefits Delivery Services Branch (BDSB) offices.

**Scope of Work**

* Supply of 535,000 ESDC/Service Canada envelopes
* Shipping services to distribute the printed products to ESDC's BDSB office

**Contract Period**

* Estimated contract period: Contract award to March 31, 2024

**Key Dates**

* Tender closing date: September 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM
* Contract award: By March 31, 2024

**Trade Agreements**
This opportunity is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Contact Information**
Julie Barrette
Procurement Officer
Email: [julie.barrette@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.barrette@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 551-9889

**Attachment**
The complete tender notice is available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8711/rfp-100024134---en---01-09-2023---jb.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8711/rfp-100024134---en---01-09-2023---jb.pdf
